ModMetaData.name: Apparello v 1.6.3
ModMetaData.author: Shinzy
ModMetaData.description:
Adds few pieces of clothing to the mix to tingle your colonists' sense of fashion with! and help them survive.
New clothes new hats new pants, gloves and socks! and definately no washing machine. Have fun!
Russian translation by Skyarkhangel. Hardcore SK global modpack
